info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
Driftwood River near Edinburgh.
East Fork White River at Williams.
Muscatatuck River at Vernon.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...
East Fork White River near Rivervale.
.Significant and some major flooding is expected to develop along the East Fork White River due to several rounds of heavy rainfall through Sunday. Wednesday night rainfall of generally one to three inches fell across the East Fork White basin. Additional rainfall of five to seven inches in the East Fork White basin is expected through Sunday morning, and this is all included in today's forecasts.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams.
* WHEN...From late Friday night until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flood levels approach a serious level. Evacuations are necessary for those on lowest knolls. Flood waters cover nearly the entire flood plain.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:55 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 19.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued this afternoon by around 200 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
